They did not invade or provoke any other nations, but if another entered their territory, they would retaliate with deadly force.{{r|Black Panther Vol 4 1}} They remained this way for thousands of years until the modern era when they decided to join the global community. This was still a matter of contention for the Wakandan people,{{r|Black Panther Vol 4 3}} and led to the creation of the [[Desturi (Earth-616)|Desturi]] an ultra-conservative, xenophobic group who wished to return to their old isolationist ways.{{r|Black Panther Vol 5 7}} | Equipment = | Transportation = | Weapons = | Notes = * The word '''Desturi''' comes from the Swahili language, and means "Custom" or "Tradition". | Trivia = | Links = }} [[Category:Wakandan Organizations]] [[Category:Terrorist Organizations]]
